mapper.select: SELECT p.postno, p.cateno, p.posttitle, p.postcontent, p.regdate FROM post p, ( SELECT max(cateno) as cateNo FROM category where id = #{id}) c where p.cateno = c.cateno order by p.postno desc

SELECT p.postno, p.cateno, p.posttitle, p.postcontent, p.regdate FROM post p, ( SELECT max(postno) as postNo FROM post pn, ( SELECT max(cateno) as cateNo FROM category where id = #{id} ) cn where pn.cateno = cn.cateNo ) maxpn where p.postno = maxpn.postNo
